The snail phylum is molluscs. The scientific name of a common garden snail is helix aspersa. The scientific name for a snail in general is helix aspersa. The scientific name may differ depending on the exact species of snail. Two of the land snail scientific names are Helix pomatia  and  Helix aspersa . The helix at the beginning of the names comes from the Greek word έλικα (elika), and the snails are called so, because their shell is that shape.
